46 PatchInfo::PatchInfo(PatchKernel const *patch)
47  : m_patch(nullptr)
48 {
49  setPatch(patch, false);
50 }

55 PatchInfo::~PatchInfo()
56 {
57 }

64 PatchKernel const & PatchInfo::getPatch() const
65 {
66  return *m_patch;
67 }

74 void PatchInfo::setPatch(PatchKernel const *patch)
75 {
76  setPatch(patch, true);
77 }
78 
85 void PatchInfo::setPatch(PatchKernel const *patch, bool initialize)
86 {
87  // Reset information
88  if (m_patch != nullptr) {
89  reset();
90  }
91 
92  // Set the patch
93  m_patch = patch;
94 
95  // Call initialization
96  if (initialize) {
97  _init();
98  }
99 }
100 
104 void PatchInfo::reset()
105 {
106  _reset();
107 }
108 
112 void PatchInfo::extract()
113 {
114  if (m_patch == nullptr) {
115  return;
116  }
117 
118  // Reset information
119  reset();
120 
121  // Extract new information
122  _extract();
123 }
124 
128 void PatchInfo::update()
129 {
130  extract();
131 }
132 
145 PatchNumberingInfo::PatchNumberingInfo(PatchKernel const *patch)
146  : PatchInfo(patch)
147 {
148  PatchNumberingInfo::_init();
149 
150  extract();
151 }
152 
156 void PatchNumberingInfo::_init()
157 {
158  m_cellConsecutiveOffset = -1;
159 }
160 
164 void PatchNumberingInfo::_reset()
165 {
166  // Clear data
167  m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.clear();
168 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
169  m_nGlobalInternalCells.clear();
170 #endif
171 
172  // Initialize data
173  _init();
174 }
175 
179 void PatchNumberingInfo::_extract()
180 {
181  long consecutiveId;
182 
183 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
184  // Initialize communications
185  size_t exchangeDataSize = sizeof(consecutiveId);
186  std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator;
187 
188  if (m_patch->isPartitioned()) {
189  // Create the data communicator
190  dataCommunicator = std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator>(new DataCommunicator(m_patch->getCommunicator()));
191 
192  // Set and start the receives
193  for (const auto &entry : m_patch->getGhostCellExchangeTargets()) {
194  const int rank = entry.first;
195  const auto &list = entry.second;
196 
197  dataCommunicator->setRecv(rank, list.size() * exchangeDataSize);
198  dataCommunicator->startRecv(rank);
199  }
200  }
201 #endif
202 
203 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
204  // Get the internal cell count of all the partitions
205  if (m_patch->isPartitioned()) {
206  m_nGlobalInternalCells.resize(m_patch->getProcessorCount());
207  long nLocalInternalCells = m_patch->getInternalCellCount();
208  MPI_Allgather(&nLocalInternalCells, 1, MPI_LONG, m_nGlobalInternalCells.data(), 1, MPI_LONG, m_patch->getCommunicator());
209  } else {
210  m_nGlobalInternalCells.resize(1);
211  m_nGlobalInternalCells[0] = m_patch->getInternalCellCount();
212  }
213 #endif
214 
215  // Evalaute the consecutive id of the internal cells
216  if (m_patch->getInternalCellCount() > 0) {
217  std::map<long,long> nativeIds;
218  for (auto itr = m_patch->internalCellConstBegin(); itr != m_patch->internalCellConstEnd(); ++itr) {
219  long id = itr.getId();
220  long nativeId = m_patch->_getCellNativeIndex(id);
221 
222  nativeIds.insert({nativeId, id});
223  }
224 
225 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
226  m_cellConsecutiveOffset = getCellGlobalCountOffset();
227 #else
228  m_cellConsecutiveOffset = 0;
229 #endif
230 
231  consecutiveId = m_cellConsecutiveOffset;
232  for (auto itr = nativeIds.begin(); itr != nativeIds.end(); ++itr) {
233  m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.insert({itr->second, consecutiveId++});
234  }
235 
236  std::map<long,long>().swap(nativeIds);
237  }
238 
239 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
240  // Communicate the consecutive id of the ghost cells
241  if (m_patch->isPartitioned()) {
242  // Set and start the sends
243  for (const auto &entry : m_patch->getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
244  const int rank = entry.first;
245  auto &list = entry.second;
246 
247  dataCommunicator->setSend(rank, list.size() * exchangeDataSize);
248  SendBuffer &buffer = dataCommunicator->getSendBuffer(rank);
249  for (long id : list) {
250  buffer << m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.at(id);
251  }
252  dataCommunicator->startSend(rank);
253  }
254 
255  // Receive the consecutive ids of the ghosts
256  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
257  while (nCompletedRecvs < dataCommunicator->getRecvCount()) {
258  int rank = dataCommunicator->waitAnyRecv();
259  const auto &list = m_patch->getGhostCellExchangeTargets(rank);
260 
261  RecvBuffer &buffer = dataCommunicator->getRecvBuffer(rank);
262  for (long id : list) {
263  buffer >> consecutiveId;
264  m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.insert({id, consecutiveId});
265  }
266 
267  ++nCompletedRecvs;
268  }
269 
270  // Wait for the sends to finish
271  dataCommunicator->waitAllSends();
272  }
273 #endif
274 }

281 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellConsecutiveOffset() const
282 {
283  return m_cellConsecutiveOffset;
284 }
285 
292 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellConsecutiveId(long id) const
293 {
294  return m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.at(id);
295 }
296 
302 const std::unordered_map<long, long> & PatchNumberingInfo::getCellConsecutiveMap() const
303 {
304  return m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap;
305 }
306 
307 
308 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
314 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellGlobalCount() const
315 {
316  long nGlobalCells = 0;
317  for (long count : m_nGlobalInternalCells) {
318  nGlobalCells += count;
319  }
320 
321  return nGlobalCells;
322 }
323 
329 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellGlobalCountOffset() const
330 {
331  return getCellGlobalCountOffset(m_patch->getRank());
332 }
333 
340 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellGlobalCountOffset(int rank) const
341 {
342  long offset = 0;
343  for (int i = 0; i < rank; ++i) {
344  offset += m_nGlobalInternalCells[i];
345  }
346 
347  return offset;
348 }
349 
356 long PatchNumberingInfo::getCellGlobalId(long id) const
357 {
358  // Global ids and consecutive ids are the same
359  return m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap.at(id);
360 }
361 
367 const std::unordered_map<long, long> & PatchNumberingInfo::getCellGlobalMap() const
368 {
369  // Global ids and consecutive ids are the same
370  return m_cellLocalToConsecutiveMap;
371 }
372 
373 
380 int PatchNumberingInfo::getCellRankFromLocal(long id) const
381 {
382  auto ghostCellOwnerItr = m_patch->m_ghostCellOwners.find(id);
383  if (ghostCellOwnerItr != m_patch->m_ghostCellOwners.end()) {
384  return ghostCellOwnerItr->second;
385  } else {
386  return m_patch->getRank();
387  }
388 }
389 
396 int PatchNumberingInfo::getCellRankFromConsecutive(long id) const
397 {
398  if (m_patch->isPartitioned()) {
399  return m_patch->getRank();
400  }
401 
402  long offset = 0;
403  for (int k = 0; k < m_patch->getProcessorCount(); ++k) {
404  offset += m_nGlobalInternalCells[k];
405  if (id < offset) {
406  return k;
407  }
408  }
409 
410  return -1;
411 }
412 
419 int PatchNumberingInfo::getCellRankFromGlobal(long id) const
420 {
421  // Global ids and consecutive ids are the same
422  return getCellRankFromConsecutive(id);
423 }
424 #endif
425 
426 }
